Content: Sections of the campaign should have epilogues, depending on the
players action (e.g. if the player massacres a lot of civilians during
Agamemmnons rebellion, the narrator may say ''it was the bloodiest
conflict until the andromeda crisis''; in the last part (''The
leverage'') it may range from ''the [alien polity] was squashed by the
empire quickly after their victory at Echelon'' to ''it took the empire
centuries to recover from the loss of Echelon and finally subdue the
[alien polity] completely'', depending on the players performance.
